prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letters of R.D. Blackmore, Accession #5252-i, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These letters were purchased from John Wilson Autographs, Ltd. in Oxford, England, on December 30, 1985.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains two letters, July 24, 1890 and [July 1890], from Richard Doddridge Blackmore to the "Editor of Wit and Wisdom," concerning a story in his paper that gave incorrect personal details about Blackmore and Blackmore's corrections.
